record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - November 07, 2007)

[Page: H13228]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that Members have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks and insert extraneous material on H.R. 3685.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
